content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of:
• A furnace unit used to convert iron ore and coal into iron plates, supporting the recovery process by boosting iron plate availability.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of:
• A furnace unit used to smelt copper ore with coal into copper plates, enabling later production steps that require copper components.

(Note: Multiple attempts to craft and place a Lab were made without success; no Lab structure is currently present on the map.)

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Call Formatting Errors
 – When invoking get_entities, use parameters matching the function’s defined signature. Avoid using unsupported keywords (such as "radius") or incorrect positional arguments.

• Inventory and Placement Validation
 – Before attempting to place a structure (e.g. a Lab), confirm that the requisite item is present in the inventory to prevent placement failures.

• Iterable Verification
 – Ensure that any value expected to be an iterable (for instance, the result from get_entities) is properly validated against None before iterating.

• Crafting Resource Chain Completeness
 – Confirm that every prerequisite ingredient and intermediate component (e.g. iron-plate, iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, copper-cable) is sufficiently available and that the supporting production facilities are operational prior to beginning complex crafting processes.

• Resource Shortage Monitoring
 – Continuously track resource quantities during recovery processes so that shortages are identified early and remedial actions (like additional smelting) are completed before initiating high-cost crafting attempts.
